settings.heading: Trusted by 275K+ Customers
settings.description: We've helped thousands of customers achieve their skin goals.

settings.name: Dr. Andrea Suarez, MD, FAAD
settings.quote: I am honored and excited to be a part of the Omnilux Scientific Advisory Board. I recommend their devices to patients seeking to complement in office treatments. Their devices are backed by clinical evidence and are based on the same Omnilux Medical devices used in dermatology clinics for years. Plus, patients love using them and appreciate excellent results.

settings.name: Dr. Jared Jagdeo, MD
settings.qualification: Associate Professor of Dermatology, SUNDY Downstate Medical Center
settings.quote: I trust Omnilux Contour as it’s backed by clinical evidence and based on the same Omnilux Medical devices we’ve used in our clinic for years. And my patients love it - they appreciate the excellent results and convenience of in-home treatments

settings.name: Dr. Glynis Ablon, MD, FAAD
settings.quote: The amount of LED bulbs, the ease of use, maneuverability, portability, and significant results all played a part in my choice of purchasing not one but two Omnilux Medical devices for my office - and to offer the home-use contour and CLEAR units to my patterns

settings.name: Dr. Hany Abi Ghosn, MD
settings.qualification: Aesthetic Medicine, Winner Best Medical Practice Award, Europe 2018
settings.quote: The devices provide them with a powerful tool to achieve excellent clearance from home without the adverse effects from more aggressive treatments. It is a must for those looking for non-invasive and sustainable results

settings.name: Terrie Absher Kochman
settings.qualification: Licensed Medical Aesthetician; Founder, Total Glow Medical Spa
settings.quote: The Omnilux Contour Mask is the best home device ever! Just three (3) treatments a week produces very noticeable results such as a brightening of the complexion, reducing pigmentation. inflammation and redness, and smoothing fine lines. At Total Glow we know firsthand the superior performance of the Omnilux Professional FDA-approved LED device, and therefore had high expectations for the home-use Omnilux Contour Mask. We were not disappointed

settings.name: Dr. Clara Hurst
settings.quote: The Omnilux Contour Mask is great for general rejuvenation of the skin. The red light is going to work really well on pigmentation, redness, and inflammation of the skin. The red light brightens up the skin and the white light [the near-infared light] means you’re going to be producing more collagen which has the benefit of softer, smoother, more dewy, healthy skin - you just get a beautiful glow.

settings.heading: Trusted by dermatologists and aesthetic experts

settings.subtitle: Elegance in Aging
settings.title: Contour with Confidence
settings.description:
See the transformative effects of the Omnilux Contour™ FACE, backed by scientific evidence.

  • 98% of participants reported their skin felt firmer
  • 96% of participants reported their fine lines appeared less visible
  • 95% of participants reported that their skin was brighter and plumper

settings.subtitle: Science-Driven Results
settings.title: Changing Men's Skincare
settings.description:
Discover how our LED mask uniquely benefits men's skin, proven by rigorous study. After 3-5 treatments per week for 6 weeks participants reported:

  • Reduction in UV spots (sun damage)
  • Fine lines appeared less visible
  • Skin tone was more even

settings.subtitle: Safety in Light
settings.title: Safety Shines Bright
settings.description:
Groundbreaking research verifies Red and red and near-infrared therapy's safety, offering peace of mind with every session.

  • Confirmed safe on human skin cells, causing no DNA damage.
  • Extensive testing underscores red and near-infrared light therapy as a safe skincare solution.
  • Demonstrated near-infrared light, even at doses significantly higher than standard clinical guidelines, does not induce DNA damage and has a favorable safety profile.
